top_comments.comment: This is the best thing I learned regarding the guest room. You don't just tell us what to do but explain why as well in a so confident way. So nice to hear advices from a real expert. You're the best Liza. Thanks a lot dear 😘

I ask my guests/family while they stay to let me know if there is anything I need to add or change to help in their stay. I make a list to get or do if it doesn’t happen while they are here. Then the next time when someone stays it is much better. 
That’s when I learned about the tissues, fans, and the tub drain that wasn’t draining well.

comments_since_last_sample.body: ... and the mother in law will never leave again!! 😒 just kidding!! Thanks for the great tips, Lisa!! 🥰🥰

I know this is random but would you give tips for a buy to rent home.we have a 2 bed that we are renovating from the brickwork out new electrics etc to rent to tenants.  I would love some help with decor or feel ideas.
Lisa you are totally a rock star.
Loved the welcome basket and the robes idea! I love these tips LISA!!! Thanks for sharing all your knowledge. LOVE from Argentina!
